title: Can't signup for PBE
body: I have been unable to create my PBE account for weeks now since receiving the acceptance email. I have tried to click the "Create your Account" link on numerous internet connections and browsers, but it always results in the same page saying "Application Received." Can anyone help me create my account?

replies.body: This is happening because the live account that the application is tied to has been permanently suspended. You will be unable to access the PBE system with this link, but if you have any other questions, let me know.
Is it possible for me to link it to my new live account, or sign up with a different method?

You can [sign up for access](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe) on your new account, but the current invite is permanently tied to the suspended account and cannot be transferred to a different one.
